items.title: Google DeepMind just changed hurricane forecasting forever with new AI model
items.description: Google DeepMind launches Weather Lab platform for AI hurricane forecasting, showing improved accuracy in early tests with U.S. National Hurricane Cent...

items.title: Microsoft-backed Mistral launches European AI cloud to compete with AWS and Azure
items.description: Mistral AI partners with Nvidia to launch European AI infrastructure platform, challenging US cloud giants while unveiling breakthrough reasoning mode...

items.title: Databricks open-sources declarative ETL framework powering 90% faster pipeline builds
items.description: With Apache Spark Declarative Pipelines, engineers describe what their pipeline should do using SQL or Python, and Apache Spark handles the execution.

items.title: ‘Generative AI helps us bend time’: CrowdStrike, Nvidia embed real-time LLM defense, changing how enterprises secure AI
items.description: Falcon is now built into Nvidia’s LLMs, delivering native runtime threat defense and eliminating blind spots across AI pipelines.

items.title: Asset sprawl, siloed data and CloudQuery’s search for unified cloud governance
items.description: CloudQuery's developer-first approach to cloud governance pulls data from 60-plus sources into a single, queryable data warehouse.
